Reviews.Title: “A comfortable, clean and really good bargain”
Reviews.Author: kanesmama
Reviews.Content: Ibis has always been one of our favorite chains in Europe and the Istanbul Ibis did not disappoint. The shower is especially good. The rooms are equipped with safes (not easy to use) and one is offered complimentary bottled water and coffee upon arrival. Our room (130) has a lovely view of the Golden Horn. The hotel offers three shuttles at a nominal fee to three tourist areas. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Sea View”
Reviews.Author: Ebrahim H
Reviews.Content: For our three persons family coming with our car to Istanbul in high season ibis was a good deal , a reasonable price for three nights in sea view double room with a sofa bed for our son . disadvantages are : - no breakfast included in room price . - the only way to reach the hotel is by car or taxi , no bus/metro/train station , no walking path . - not in the center of touristic attractions of Istanbul .

Reviews.Title: “I am happy for my choice”
Reviews.Author: Guesa R
Reviews.Content: I stayed for a weekend in ibis Hotel Ä°stanbul, Ä± use generally Ä°bis Hotels , but this hotel was amazing , value is not so expensive, rooms are very smartly designed , and my best is all staff is smiling everytime and they are ready for the help whenever you need , very easy to arrive airport .

Reviews.Title: “Overpriced for what you get.”
Reviews.Author: DRD1965
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Ibis because I needed to add a couple of more nights to my stay in Istanbul. The location to Bakirkoy is great. Since I was lacking Internet connection and made the reservation on the phone, I had to pay the higher price. They wouldn't even match. Also, for the price, I didn't even get breakfast. I could have stayed in Sultanahment in a nicer place, paid less and had breakfast included. The only thing the door guy did is check the metal detector. Never even offered to open the door or help with packages. The room are clean but small. But not even a scrap of paper to make a note. If you wanted a sea view, more money. The front desk was good about calling a taxi but after all there is a taxi stand close by. The food in the restaurant was okay. The waiter made it out that my plate was going to large portion, not. Wait was nice,but service was a little slow forthr amount of customers there. I don't recommend this hotel. Pay more money and stay at the Novotel or even the Sheraton if you need to be in the Atakoy/Bakirkoy area. If you stay in Sultanahmet/Sirkeci area stay at the Armade hotel or the Yasmak Sultan hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel, very good value”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: This is not the most luxury hotel and this is not the biggest room hotel ever. However, this was my first stay and I say it is very very good. Very convenient, very clean, comfortable, etc. Everything is enough ! Internet is fast, especially for business, food at the restaurant perfect. Breakfast is great. Stuff is very professional and supportive. Free of charge garage for cars. Very close to everything. Good location. I will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “weekend holiday”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: really succesfull hotel i stayed in bursa at ibis bursa and i stayed in istanbul too. because i like the concept of hotel and cleanness but i didnt sleep because of roommates and room cleaners. they must be quite. one time a cleanning lady came to my room. alsa i put the door dont quite roll. i felt really nervous really

Reviews.Title: “A good hotel in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Me and my family like this hotel when we visit Istanbul. Ibis Istanbul is near to the city center, it offer a very good location and a free car parking, very important for Istanbul. I just thing that the breakfast is too expensive. The hotels management has to thing about this.

Reviews.Title: “A Peaceful Stay in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: The only possible way to reach the Hotel from any part of the City is to take a taxi. If you can overcome the mad traffic density,or transportation difficulties in Istanbul to reach the Hotel, Ibis (or Novotel) offers you a peaceful and comfortable stay. Almost all of your basic needs are met within modest standarts.

Reviews.Title: “Everything that you need in a smart clean comfortable hotel at a good price.”
Reviews.Author: AdelaideRobbie Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Hotel Ibis has everything that you need in a hotel. The room was cosy and comfortable with a good en-suite shower room. It had on-site underground parking and free internet in the lobby. There was a free shuttle both to the city centre (old city) and the local shopping area. Because of its location overlooking the sea there is nothing much within walking distance although the local bus passes the front of the hotel The reception staff were excellent and when we had a problem with the shuttle bus to the city centre they not only solved the problem quickly but also followed up to make sure that everything was OK. Top marks.

Reviews.Title: “Small but nice”
Reviews.Author: Alexei_k1
Reviews.Content: Generally hotel is OK for 1-2 nights stopover.The building forms one complex with Novotel situated in the middle of the road from the airport to the citi center. It is far from the sightseens but there is a shuttle service from hotel to the center (Taksim or Sultanhamet areas) only for 5 TL (2,5 USD). If you travel by car - parking garage is free. Rooms are very small but tidy and clean. Matress on the bad is OK. In room safe, tea facilities. Service is good and the staff is pleasant. Resuming- good hotel for the asked price but far from center.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel but NIL Public Transportation”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Neat, clean hotel. Courteous, English speaking staff. Only problems being that there is almost NIL public transportation nearby. The hotel does not provide courtesy pick-up/drop from/to International airport.

Reviews.Title: “Beware the kitchen”
Reviews.Author: highman123
Reviews.Content: Good 'hard product' with well designed rooms and bathrooms. I woke up and thought for a moment I'm in France. If you can get the wifi to work it's fast. But beware of the kitchen. I ordered the Asian Wok chicken in the super noisy bar and it arrived 15 minutes later. The rice and water I ordered with it did not come - my reminder resulted in serving it after I was done with the chicken. It was a strange mix of kitchen leftovers mixed with too many wrong spices. I spend the next 2 hours vomiting it back up :( Also teh pool and gym are 20 EUR extra? Strange. My complaints would be met with indifference the next morning. Stay there but never ever eat anything.

Reviews.Title: “Ibis Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Hotel was clean and generally of good standard. A little far from the town centre and the nearest tram stop is a bit of a walk therefore best to take a taxi, which can take time in heavy traffic. Was fine for a short stopover though as it is just a 15 min taxi ride from the airport.

Reviews.Title: “A good hotel but an inconvenient location”
Reviews.Author: Irikos
Reviews.Content: The hotel was all right, the rooms were small but clean, the internet connection was quite fast and the service was good. The breakfast was surprisingly good and rather rich. The only problem was location. If you want to reach the city centre in quite a short time, this hotel is not for you. The trip to the city centre takes about 30 minutes and is rather risky. If you want to get to the ferry or to the airport, then it's just the right place to go.

Reviews.Title: “very nice”
Reviews.Author: mhajizamani
Reviews.Content: the hotel was very nice. everything was OK. we stayed for one short night (we had to catch the plane early morning). the only problem about this hotel is public transportation. you need to take taxi every time you are going outside. if you have a car be sure that ibis will be one of the best choices that you will have in Istanbul. parking is free and very big. staffs are very nice.

Reviews.Title: “Great Ibis”
Reviews.Author: borwukNewYork
Reviews.Content: This is a great Ibis. Highly recommend the breakfast buffet. The hotel is located in an urban renewal area and the back rooms look over an empty plot with Istanbul's historic area visible on the back. Sea viewing rooms have great views of Marmara Sea, full of boats waiting to enter Bosphorus. I gave 3 stars to hotel location because I really did not know to give 5 stars or 1 star. If you have a car, the hotel's location is fabulous. Ataturk International Airport or Yenikapi ferry terminal to cross Marmara sea to Bursa or Bandirma is only 10 minutes drive from hotel. (hotel offers free self parking to guests, underground, guarded) However, you can not walk anywhere from this hotel. Hotel has its own taxi stand and taxis are available 24 hours. Istanbul taxis are reasonably price, clean and all have taximeters.

Reviews.Title: “IBIS”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: The hotel location is good if you know how to move around Istanbul but still far from the happening places, i liked the hotel but what i did not understand that we can't use the swimming pool unless we pay extra 25 TL, they say it belongs to Novotel and what i know that both belong to Accor, anyways in fact i liked the hotel very much and sure would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “very good value, excellent service and shuttle into town”
Reviews.Author: royvince
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 3 nights, arrived early 0530 in the morning day one and was well looked after by the staff and given an early check in after some tea and coffee. good rooms well cleaned, and good all round service. a shuttle bus into town is great and very cheap, some extra departure times could be useful. loved Istanbul, would recommend this hotel for people who require good service at a reasonable price. Great people in reception will do anything to assist.

Reviews.Title: “nice stay”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: i chose this hotel becoz i have a car and there is plenty of car park at basement for free.....and the location is away from crawded areas.....enjoyed staying there....eventhought the rooms are bit small otherwise everything is nice and worth the money i spent there....

Reviews.Title: “July-11 stay at Ibis”
Reviews.Author: Anwer Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Stayed for business trip. Rooms below par to Novotel . is a utility place with great bar and very friendly staff, okay place to stay. Rooms are cramped and not comfortable but the service is good. Recommended only for proximity to places of interest.

Reviews.Title: “good airport hotel”
Reviews.Author: CHRISTOS_GR60
Reviews.Content: stayed for 1 night . nice comfortable ,small rooms, nice bosporus view very clean excellent breakfast ,not expensive very delicious night dinner shuttle to the city

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: The only negative thing I have to point out is the location, which is far away from the center in case someone wants to visit the city in his free time. The bus service is helpful, but could be more frequent.

Reviews.Title: “Typical Ibis Hotel”
Reviews.Author: MiMetwally
Reviews.Content: At first I was almost put off by the location review, having many TA members complaining about the location and inaccessibility to the surroundign area/ zeytinburno station. yet I went ahead, being a loyal accor member, so I took a leap of faith and it was worth it For some odd reason, when trying to book through Accor.com, the hotel is not listed when searching by 2 adults + 1 child in one room, it gets listed only when searcing for 2 adults only, I contacted the hotel by mail telling them that hotel facilities listed includes baby cot in room, but does not accept reservations for adults + children, they responded right away that I should do the reservation for 2 adults only and send them the reservation number with my request for baby cot, I did and when we checked in our room the baby cot was already installed Friendly staff, welcoming us upon arrival doing their best to provide early check in at 7 am, we waited for an hour till a room was checked out as the hotel was full (and we saw that 15 minutes after check out we were checked in to a clean room), during waiting time the reception staff explained how to reach various destinations and how to use hotel shuttle, throwing in some written/ spoken words for emergencies. If you need a taxi explain to reception where you want to go and they'll phone for one at no extra charge adn it comes in 5 minutes, we did use the shuttle and it was perfect, left and arrived on time for only 5 liras both ways (Hotel - Sultanahmet/ Taksim - Hotel), taxi to airport costs 20 liras / 15 minutes Location gets only 4/5 because it's not possible to walk around the hotel, you have to come/ leave using either taxi or bus M

Reviews.Title: “Value for money for business travellers”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Good hotel with friendly staff and clean rooms. Free wifi availible in rooms, which is a big extra if you want to save money during your business trip. Only problem is location, you need to take a taxi (or their shuttle bus) to go to city center, cannot walk anywhere.

Reviews.Title: “My stay at the IBIS Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: Hotel good value, staff friendly and helpful. Have stayed at this hotel for last 3 years during the month of February. This year 2011 i was sadly disappointed with the qualitry of the food in the restaurant. one meal was cold and had to sent back.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel with inconvenient location”
Reviews.Author: Perepel
Reviews.Content: Good hotel - and all standards for usual business hotel are complied... good kitchen.. but the location is just awful. Between the airport and city center, there is no other transport except the taxi. Moreover, it's very hard to get there during the rush hours, because the hotel is situated on the major city highway, which can be heavily loaded. I can recommend it only for the overnight stay for business travellers who not interested in sightseeing.

Reviews.Title: “very friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: Knoedeltester
Reviews.Content: the hotel staff is efficient and very friendly, especially the reception staff during check in (sorry guys forgot your names). the room was spacious, none smoking and clean with a fantastic view over the sea. In general the Ibis concept is just perfect and it works perfect there. the restaurant also had a very nice atmosphere and food was good. I also want to thank Mr. Erkan, the Operations Manager for his help and assistance. Great hotel with great people...I wish I could come back under nicer circumstances
